'''Lorri Holt''' ([[1953]]) is an award-winning [[wikipedia:San Francisco Bay|Bay Area]] stage actress.

==History==
Holt graduated from Bennington College, in [[wikipedia:Bennington, Vermont|Bennington, Vermont]] with a Master's degree in Writing and Literature. She started acting in the seventies, and has since appeared as Angel in ''[[wikipedia:Angels in America: A Gay Fantasia on National Themes|Angels in America]]'', Sister Aloysius in [[wikipedia:John Patrick Shanley|John Patrick Shanley]]'s ''[[wikipedia:Doubt: A Parable|Doubt]]'', and also starred in ''[[wikipedia:The Vagina Monologues|The Vagina Monologues]]''. In the world of film, she appeared as a nurse in ''[[wikipedia:Patch Adams|Patch Adams]]''. 

==Roles==
* [[2003]]: [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (video game)]]: Additional voices
